text.section: the name of the foreign limited partnership and, if different, the name under which it proposes to do business in the commonwealth;
the jurisdiction where such partnership was organized and the date of its organization;
the general character of the business it proposes to do in the commonwealth;
the business address of its principal office;
the names, business addresses and residence addresses of its general partners;
the business address of its principal office in the commonwealth, if any;
the name and business address of its resident agent and the agent’s written consent, either on the certificate or attached to it, to his appointment as agent; and

the address of the office at which is kept a list of the names and addresses of the limited partners and their capital contributions, together with an undertaking by the foreign limited partnership to keep those records until the foreign limited partnership’s registration in the commonwealth is cancelled.
